thread.title: Al-Qaeda Member Identified as Hollywood Assistant Director's Son
thread.title_full: Al-Qaeda Member Identified as Hollywood Assistant Director's Son

title: Al-Qaeda Member Identified as Hollywood Assistant Director's Son
text:
Al-Qaeda Member Identified as Hollywo... Al-Qaeda Member Identified as Hollywood Assistant Director's Son Next Story Prev Story 16 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
An Al-Qaeda supporter appearing in a recent video is the son of Patrick Kinney, who has numerous Hollywood film credits, CNN reports . Abu Basir Al-Britani can be seen in a video posted by website Intelligence Group, in which he criticizes ISIS for bombing "the houses of innocent Muslims" in a village in northern Syria.   Hollywood Reporter.
